ISSUE.TITLE: Notification when reordering unpublished products
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: > nopCommerce version: 4.50.3 > > Steps to reproduce the problem: > 1. A user sends an order with multiple products. > 2. An administrator removes one product's publication. > 3. The user clicks on the re-order button on the order's page. > 4. The new cart doesn't contain any unpublished product (that's OK), but there is no notification about the missing products. > > It would be better if nopCommerce would send a message about the missing products, or just a generic text (e.g., "Some products are not available anymore, so they weren't added to the cart.") Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/94636/notification-about-missing-products-re-order
